Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Well! You're a new face round here, if I'm
any judge. Welcome to Hateno Pasture!
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>My daughter, Koyin, is always out staring
into that pond, so I doubt she'd be any
help gathering acorns.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>I was keeping it squirreled away, <sp:5:0:0>but no
reason to be a miser about it now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I better go mix up a batch of feed right
away now that I got some more acorns.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_01>If you ever want more fresh milk, I'll swap
you some for <clr:0000>three acorns<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Call it a
special trade, just for you.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Sure you are. The milk from my cows is
the best in Hateno! The secret's in the
special feed I make for 'em.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Except I've been havin' trouble getting my
hands on <clr:0000>acorns <clr:ffff>to mix up any more of it.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>There used to be tons of acorns all over
the ground in the <clr:0000>forest out back<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>No idea where they all went. Probably the
<clr:0000>squirrels<clr:ffff> started takin' over and grabbing
them all for themselves.<sp:0:4:0>Sometimes they'll drop the acorns they
carry in their cheeks if you startle 'em,
but they're quick little critters.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>I need at least <clr:0000>three acorns<clr:ffff> to make my
special feed, so it's a real problem for me.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_01>There used to be tons of acorns all over
the ground in the forest out back.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Dadgum <clr:0000>squirrels<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Come to buy some fresh milk, wanderer?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Hate to be the bearer of bad news, <sp:5:0:0>but
right now I don't have any <clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff> to
offer you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I've been havin' some trouble getting my
hands on the acorns I mix into the cows'
special feed.<sp:0:4:0>If it's milk you're after, <sp:5:0:0>they might still
have some out at the general store.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>If I just had <clr:0000>three<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>acorns<clr:ffff>, I could
mix up another batch of feed...<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Don't tell me you haven't heard of my
farm's <clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff>! <sp:5:0:0>It's the best in Hateno!<sp:0:4:0>The secret's in the special feed I make for
my cows. <sp:5:0:0>It gives their milk an extra li'l
something you don't get anywhere else.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Except I've been havin' trouble getting my
hands on <clr:0000>acorns <clr:ffff>to mix up any more of it.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>There used to be tons of acorns all over
the ground in the <clr:0000>forest out back<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>No idea where they all went. <sp:5:0:0>Probably the
<clr:0000>squirrels<clr:ffff> started takin' over and grabbing
them all for themselves.<sp:0:4:0>Sometimes they'll drop the acorns they
carry in their cheeks if you startle 'em,<sp:5:0:0>
but they're quick little critters.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>I need at least <clr:0000>three acorns<clr:ffff> to make my
special feed, <sp:5:0:0>so it's a real problem for me.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>There used to be tons of acorns all over
the ground in the <clr:0000>forest out back<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Dadgum <clr:0000>squirrels<clr:ffff>, breedin' left and right...<sp:0:4:0>Maybe if I startle 'em, they'll drop the acorn they
got in their cheeks. But they're some quick li'l
critters...how'm I supposed to get close?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Hate to be the bearer of bad news, but
right now I don't have any <clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff> to
offer you.<sp:0:4:0>If I just had <clr:0000>three<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>acorns<clr:ffff>, I could mix up
another batch of feed...
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS>I appreciate the sentiment, but I'll need
more than a kind gesture. It takes at least
<clr:0000>three acorns<clr:ffff> to mix their feed, y'see.<sp:0:4:0>There used to be tons of acorns all over
the ground in the <clr:0000>forest out back<clr:ffff>, but
darned if I can find any now.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad><sp:0:2:2:5000>Dadgum <clr:0000>squirrels<clr:ffff>, breedin' left and right...<sp:0:4:0>Maybe if I startle 'em, they'll drop the acorns they
got in their cheeks. But they're some quick li'l
critters...how'm I supposed to get close?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Nothing like morning air on a farm, eh?
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>No foolin'? Well, I'm not gonna look a gift
horse in the mouth. Not with me at my
wit's end and all.<sp:0:4:0>I don't know if this rightly makes up for it,
but have a bottle on me.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Love to get some sun. Don't my cows look
happy to be out sunbathing?
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Excuse me, sir. I wanted to give you some
of our <clr:0000>fresh milk <clr:ffff>in exchange, but I think
your pouch is full.<sp:0:4:0>While I appreciate the thought, <sp:5:0:0>I can't
accept these for free.<sp:0:4:0>Why don't you take your acorns back for
now and see me again after you've made
some room?
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:LaughS>Didn't think I'd be getting any visitors in
this rain!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal>Time for me and the cows both to hit
the hay.
